title: Big debates coming for the Pro Football Hall of Fame Class of 2027

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Big debates coming for the Pro Football Hall of Fame Class of 2027
sources.description: The stunning exclusion of Bill Belichick from the Pro Football Hall of Fame Class of 2026 overshadowed the players who were selected.
